channel.title: Audio Interview on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Audio Interview on 0x000216

item.title: Adam Edwards Interview Part II
item.description: I recently had a fascinating dinner conversation with Adam Edwards, the president of Telarus, Inc., and I’m excited to share what I learned. In Part I of our interview, Adam discussed the philosophy behind Telarus’s remarkable success in the telecommunications industry. Launched just five years ago with its revolutionary GeoQuote (tm) instant pricing tool, Telarus has become a leading master agency, earning numerous accolades. This audio report focuses on the comprehensive range of services Telarus provides and their significance to you, the customer.

item.title: Audio Interview With Adam Edwards
item.description: Telarus, Inc. is considered a leading innovator in telecommunications marketing since the major telecom expansion of the 1990s. The company has transformed how businesses purchase services like T1, Ethernet, and other high-speed internet options. I recently spoke with Adam Edwards, Telarus’s president, to understand the company’s success as a top master agency. I’ve decided to share an MP3 recording of our conversation so you can hear directly from Adam instead of reading a transcript.
